  1. Home
  2. Departments
  3. Fire
  4. Our Department
  5. Staff

Operations of the City of Orange Fire Department is made up of three shifts (A, B, & C) of men and women who work 24 hour shifts between three fire stations throughout the City of Orange. Each shift consist of a Battalion Chief, three Captains, and several firefighters.
